publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6885 Jim Tolson: Doors Open Days in West Fife—That the Parliament welcomes Doors Open Days in West Fife on Sunday 5 September 2010; acknowledges that this annual event offers visitors and locals the opportunity to visit some of the area’s historic, quirky, new or unusual sites, free of charge; notes that this year’s venues include the Glen Pavilion situated in Pittencrieff Park, Dunfermline, the new Dunfermline Fire Station and Carnegie College’s ECOSpace building, and further notes that more information is available at www.doorsopendays.org.uk. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Jim Hume*, Bill Kidd*, John Park*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-6885 Doors Open Days in West Fife (lodged on 30 August 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*
